reviewText: you really could not go wring. The price coupled with the quality of the 4 movies makes this a no brain decision. Each movie on its on is worth the cost of the 4 together. Excellent choices.
Great Action Movies....Old Movies Are The Best....
Great 2 day service with Amzon Prime.  Excellent movies at a great bundled price. I will look for bundled movies again.
Chain reaction was a real bummer.............maybe the next three will be better. It's hard to tell . We will see

I like the movies, some more than others, and the price couldn't be beaten. Each disc is easy to get to in this case; not just stacked on top of each other in a spindle center. Would recommend for action/suspense entertainment.
